Package com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.controller.program

Class ProgramController

java.lang.Object
com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.controller.program.ProgramController
public class ProgramController extends Object
This controller contains all functionality to initialize the application, load, save and compile a program. Furthermore, it creates and opens a new stage, if a new Program is loaded, or it loads the DefaultProgram on the Application start
Author:
Jonas Pohl

    • PREFIX_TEMPLATE

      public static final String PREFIX_TEMPLATE
      Constant String for the editor prefix which is needed to compile the class and load into the simulator. This String will not be shown in the editor content.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • POSTFIX_TEMPLATE

      public static final String POSTFIX_TEMPLATE
      Constant String for the editor postfix, to close the class and make it compilable. This postfix will not be shown in the editor content.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public static boolean initialize()
      Initializes the Application on startup and makes sure the programs folder and the DefaultRobbi class exists
      Returns:
      true if initialization finished successfully, false otherwise

    • createAndShow

      public static void createAndShow(javafx.stage.Window parent)
      Creates a Dialog and asks the user to for the name of the new program. Afterwards, it initiates the creation of a new stage for the program.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent window to show alerts relative to the parent window
      See Also:
      • createAndShow(String)

    • createAndShow

      public static void createAndShow(String programName)
      Creates a new file with default content, if it does not exist. Afterwards, it creates a program and a new Stage. Finally, it compiles the code and loads the Robbi instance into the simulation
      Parameters:
      programName - the name of the program to create

    • createAndShow

      public static void createAndShow(String programName, String programCode, String territoryXML)
      Creates a stage with the given programName, the programCode provided and the territory encoded as XML. If the user has already a stage with the same name, he will be warned, that his program will be overwritten. Optionally, he can save his program and territory under another name. After that a new Stage will be created according to the given information.
      This method might only be used to load an example from the database.
      Parameters:
      programName - name of the program
      programCode - code of the program
      territoryXML - XML-encoded territory

    • renameFile

      public static boolean renameFile(File f, String newName)
      Renames a java file in the programs directory to the new name.
      Parameters:
      f - the file to rename
      newName - the new name of the file
      Returns:
      true if the renaming was successful, false otherwise

    • createPrefix

      public static String createPrefix(String name)
      Creates the prefix for the program-file
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the class
      Returns:
      the prefix for the class

    • createPostfix

      public static String createPostfix()
      Creates the postfix for the program-file
      Returns:
      the postfix for the class

    • createTemplate

      public static String createTemplate(String name, String content)
      Creates the template for a compilable class
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the class
      content - the content of the class
      Returns:
      a String containing a compilable java code with the given content

    • openProgram

      public static void openProgram(javafx.stage.Window parent)
      Opens a FileChooser and loads the selected file. If the file is already loaded, the ProgramController requests the focus for the loaded program. Otherwise it creates a new program and a new stage.
      Parameters:
      parent - the window to open the chooser relative to the calling window

    • compile

      public static void compile(Program program, javafx.stage.Window parent)
      Compiles the given Program and shows an error Alert if the Compilation failed otherwise it shows an success alert. If the compilation finished successfully, the new Robbi will be loaded into the territory.
      Parameters:
      program - the program to compile
      parent - the calling window to show alerts relative to the calling window

    • compile

      public static void compile(Program program, boolean showAlerts, javafx.stage.Window parent)
      Compiles the given Program and shows an error Alert if the Compilation failed otherwise it shows an success alert. If the compilation finished successfully, the new Robbi will be loaded into the territory. Before it does this, it checks if the Annotations are set correctly and if the main-Method is overwritten. An error with this post-compile check will be visualized with an Alert.
      Parameters:
      program - the program to compile
      showAlerts - flag to determine if the alerts need to be shown or not
      parent - the window calling the method in order to show the alerts relative to it

    • close

      public static void close(String name)
      Removes the program from the programsList in order to make sure it can be reopened later
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the program which is closed
